pageContext.claim: “The economy generated over 9 million jobs in the last three years, a record by far and 12 million more jobs than experts predicted.”
pageContext.analysis: No expert predicted a net loss of 3 million jobs over the three-year period Trump mentions. Much of the job gain is due to the fact that the coronavirus pandemic threw the economy into a tailspin, causing many job losses that were reversed months later when lockdown orders were lifted.
